nodes.title: Marqueee
description: A quick experiment to render efficient "ticker tape" on a canvas.
Used as part of an online treasure hunt I made.

nodes.title: txt flowers
description: A garden of emoji that slowly climbs your screen.

nodes.title: ascii garden
description: An ascii rock garden. Rake with touch / mouse.

nodes.title: typing lazy (desktop only)
description: Try touch-typing an English word without moving your fingers from their resting position on the keyboard.
This was a proof-of-concept for a keyboard glove, which was implemented in hardware by mapping the trie to a directory tree.

nodes.title: CA finder
description: Caution: it flashes! Controls listed in the README.

nodes.title: smudge
description: Created in 99B of Javascript.

nodes.title: Huertbeat
description: Pulse available Philips hue lights to whatever is playing on Spotify.

nodes.title: Huemidity
description: Control your Philips Hue lights with MIDI triggers.

nodes.title: Rainbobble
description: Rainbow remix of Bubble.

nodes.title: canvas
description: THIRTY-EIGHT rough visual experiments in alphabetical order.
Each experiment was built using a web tool I created in the spirit of OpenFrameworks and TouchDesigner. I wanted libraries close at hand with a simple API for drawing to <canvas>, SVG, etc.

nodes.title: Photo experiment
description: Combines two images by alternating them row-by-row.
Each row is placed to line up visually with the row above it, which causes a subtle shearing effect.

nodes.title: hologram
description: Cuts a hologram out of acrylic using the Hacklab TO laser cutter.

nodes.title: the camera rotates with the minute hand (animated)
Fuzzy Match Utils
description: A collection of string matching algorithms designed with React Select in mind.

nodes.title: Multi-line lists with item separators (CSS only)
Sorta
description: Manually sort a list of items using Timsort.
Abandoned UI experiment; seeing a large list is useful for large sets. Also, quicksort would work better here.

nodes.title: Node-TimSort Async
description: Asynchronous TimSort implementation for Node.js.

nodes.title: write
description: A chill place to write things.

nodes.title: Color screen
description: Full-screen hex, hsl, and rgb color picker & converter

nodes.title: Crypto Christmas
description: Improve your online privacy and security over the 12 days of Cryptmas.
I was interviewed for this work by NPR, the CBC, and PCMag.

nodes.title: ditter
description: Create a private Twitter list out of someone else's feed so you can read it.

nodes.title: RileyJShaw.???
description: A single program that outputs my name when you run it through three separate programming languages.

nodes.title: Vintage
description: wallpaper..?

nodes.title: Flutter
description: If you make a pin out of this please send me one.

nodes.title: Superformula explorer
description: "...the formula can be used to describe many complex shapes and curves that are found in nature. Gielis holds a patent related to the synthesis of patterns generated by the superformula."
:facepalm:

nodes.title: Cyber pilot (with controls)
description: Play this one in a small window. Arrow keys to move around.

nodes.title: Ring
description: It was left here by the aliens.

nodes.title: Bubble
description: Follows your mouse.

nodes.title: w h a t
description: Short narrative experiment written for the PICO-8 fantasy console.

nodes.title: Blinds
description: It resizes!

nodes.title: Blinkers
description: Threw this together to help with color inspiration for another project.

nodes.title: Flubber
description: Nobody's perfect! Takes a MIDI file and messes up a few of the notes.

nodes.title: Virtuoso
description: Play a .mid file at your own speed using a MIDI keyboard!
Works best with MIDI keyboards, but you can use your computer keyboard too.

nodes.title: average-color
description: Returns the average color from a list of HSL arrays.

nodes.title: Plaster swirls, sort of
description: I've got plaster swirls on my ceiling. This began as a recreation of that and turned into something else.

nodes.title: Synthesia
description: Synthesizer synesthesia. Turn MIDI notes into colors.

nodes.title: Spokes, etc
description: Geometric patterns created from straight lines cutting through a circle.

nodes.title: Spotlight
description: Move your mouse/finger. Remix of "filings".

nodes.title: Keyboard keyboard
description: Use a MIDI keyboard as your laptop keyboard.
Hard press = UPPERCASE, soft press = lowercase.

nodes.title: Typing for two
description: A competitive typing tutor. Two players type different paragraphs on the same keyboard, simultaneously.

nodes.title: Free
description: Poster? Coaster?

nodes.title: Falling
description: Looping CSS animation.

nodes.title: Single line tiling
description: Tiling patterns from a single spiral with a fixed modulation signal.
Though the line's formula stays consistent as it spirals out, the tile grid doesn't increase in size.

nodes.title: swirls
description: Abandoned background generator. Pattern is played out.

nodes.title: Shell or something
description: Stumbled upon this on my way to making swirls.

nodes.title: Literate theme
description: A CLI tool to update your favorite text editor theme. Emphasizes comments and mutes everything else.

nodes.title: Jittery visualizer v3
description: V1 -> V2 contained the tiniest tweak perceptually (smooth line all 'round), but it was a technical challenge. V2 -> V3 contains the tiniest code tweaks, but is perceptually very different. Uses canvas transform logic from zonin'.

nodes.title: zonin'
description: Efficiently scales and rotates canvas image data seemingly in-place using two overlapping canvas elements.

nodes.title: Dandelion
description: Independently oscillating points that form a greater picture together.

nodes.title: Have you seen my ship?
description: It's hard to see the ship... :/

nodes.title: Circling circles
description: Very simple rule applied to a bunch of particles for a smooth ripple effect.
Changing the timing function on this one is extremely satisfying.

nodes.title: Jittery visualizer v2
description: Added a linear ramp and smoothing function to v1 to make the lowest frequency bin match up with the highest frequency bin in both position and derivative. The effect is a continuous circle, versus the "speech-bubble" notch effect of v1.

nodes.title: Stepping down a corridor
description: Trying out CSS animation steps().

nodes.title: slant + swap + shift
description: Playing with bg gradient dots, CSS only.

nodes.title: sway + swell + spin
description: Playing with bg gradient stripes, CSS only.

nodes.title: Typelab
description: Repeatedly apply a set of transformations to text.

nodes.title: XOR profile card
description: Accidentally discovered this 2d water effect by stacking sine waves. Simple but convincing!

nodes.title: Function cards
description: Simple visualizations of sinusoidal functions.

nodes.title: filings
description: Cliché vector "field" "diagram".

nodes.title: Desire paths
description: Remix of ~~~ using angles & moving agents instead of absolute positions.

nodes.title: Look closer
description: CSS-only typography experiment.

nodes.title: Lattice 3
description: A tricker, more generalized case of Lattice implemented on a trangular grid.

nodes.title: Lattice
description: Lines + circles.
Blend modes + simplex noise.

nodes.title: Cyber pilot
description: Title screen born of nostalgia for the pictures we used to draw on oscilloscopes.

nodes.title: Canvas compositing operations
description: A quick look into some of the options for context.globalCompositeOperation.

nodes.title: snowballs!
description: Async/await ftw

nodes.title: Stormy green (ripples)
description: A version of Stormy Green that doesn't drift out of phase.

nodes.title: Stormy green
description: Sine waves shifting sinusoidally.
Variations on "Stone" with controlled line angles across the circle.

nodes.title: Stone
description: Sphere effect arising from random lines across a circle.
I'm sure someone else discovered this effect long before I did.

nodes.title: Arcs
description: A little doodle with a lot of circles.
Could be done far more efficiently by scaling / translating a fixed amount of concentric circles, but math-ing it was more fun :)

nodes.title: Smart-splitting window panes (CSS only)
description: If the window is wider than it is tall, it'll split into columns. Otherwise, it'll give you two rows.
This layout was rather difficult before flexbox came along.

nodes.title: Rows of 'em
description: There's nothing like driving by a field of trees in the passenger seat.
Super quick demo trying (failing, mostly) to capture the perspective effect.

nodes.title: Astronomie & Astrophysique
description: Small canvas demo using Lissajous curves.

nodes.title: Bell curves
description: Hey! It's a normal distribution!

nodes.title: Groovy!
description: Animated lava lamps with simple non-rectangular collision detection and metaballs for wax clumps.

nodes.title: NoJS edge-adaptive tooltip
description: CSS Flexbox solution to prevent tooltips from overflowing their container at the edges.

nodes.title: Mechanical waves
description: Possible header for "Mechanical waves and sound" for Khan Academy's new content redesign.
Includes a few variations.

nodes.title: Fadey text backdrop
description: CSS technique to make a semi-transparent background fade in perfectly with its box-shadow.

nodes.title: Joy Division: Unknown Pleasures
description: Iconic album art, animated with a Gaussian function and some simplex noise.
Drag your mouse over it, and click for something special.

nodes.title: render
description: A color-theory game completed as a bonus project for Khan Academy's 2016 Hackathon. Built with a friend using Unity 3D.

nodes.title: Titania
description: Contribution to the publication "Codrops" for their Line Menu Styles collection.

nodes.title: whoami.py
description: My contribution to a collection of poems.
From the project page: "there is confusion in the mixed layers of metaphors. This is not an obfuscated code repository; not really. In some ways, it is the opposite."

nodes.title: Easy Inbox Zero
description: A browser extension that removes the unread count from your Gmail inbox and title bar.

nodes.title: Eye sea
description: These used to be pokéballs.

nodes.title: Gotta catch 'em all
description: Riffing on pokéball wave.

nodes.title: Pokéball wave
description: Animated demo written alongside a new programmer who was really into Pokémon.

nodes.title: Pride and Prejudice (webkit only)
description: Pride and Prejudice in its entirety, sorted by the visual weight of its characters.
I was hoping for a more convincing gradient; the weight calculation could use some work.

nodes.title: boom!
description: A cross-browser WebExtension to declutter busy pages and make them readable again.
Written originally as a bookmarklet in 2013.

nodes.title: Tony Montana
description: Nothing gonna stop you, there's nothing that strong ♫
An excuse to write git push it to-the-limit into the console.

nodes.title: Dark Theme Everywhere
description: A forcefully applied dark theme for the web.

nodes.title: Pond
description: An ASCII art pond ripple animation.

nodes.title: XOXO Bingo
description: Bingo cards generated from the attendance list of XOXOFest. The first person to meet enough attendees "won" the party.
Built hastily between speakers on the last day of the festival; requires login with Twitter to protect attendees' identity.

nodes.title: Rings
description: A quick visual built during lunch, inspired by the base of the lunch table.

nodes.title: .supermac
description: A collection of dotfiles that I use + some scripts to keep 'em in sync.

nodes.title: A responsive one-line header
description: Maintains its default font-size until it is too wide to fit on the page. If it starts overflowing, it will adjust to take up 100% of the page width.
Requires a bit of JS on page load. Just CSS and SVG after that.

nodes.title: Touchtone math facts
description: A math facts app that you can play from a payphone.
Call +1.480.360.MATH (6284) from the US, <s>+1.647.360.MATH (6284) from Canada</s>.

nodes.title: Solar static
description: A visual demo using typed arrays.
Creates a shadow based on mouse position.

nodes.title: SpeeDOMeter
description: A speedometer that travels through time with Doc Brown.

nodes.title: Window Shopper

nodes.title: Sliding radio button menu

nodes.title: Waveform visualizer

nodes.title: Jittery shapes
description: Animated shapes with wavelike edges.
Includes an audio visualizer built with the Web Audio API.

nodes.title: Internal link offset (sticky header)
description: Sticky headers cover internally-linked content by default. The most robust solutions I've seen use JS, but these 4 lines of CSS seem to do the trick.

nodes.title: Shepard-Risset Glissando
description: Auditory illusion of a tone that continually descends in pitch. It has been described as a "sonic barber's pole".
Implemented with the Web Audio API using custom oscillators.

nodes.title: Fluid simulation
description: Jeff Thomas's Fluid Simulation, ported to Khan Academy's CS platform.

description: A game: hit space over the red dots to earn points.

nodes.title: Reaction
